00046 #ifndef LIBCURIE_EXEC_H
00047 #define LIBCURIE_EXEC_H
00048 
00049 #include <curie/io.h>
00050 
00052 #define EXEC_CALL_NO_IO 0x0001
00053 
00054 #define EXEC_CALL_PURGE 0x0002
00055 
00057 enum process_status {
00059     ps_running = 0,
00061     ps_terminated = 1
00062 };
00063 
00068 struct exec_context {
00073     int pid;
00074 
00076     int exitstatus;
00077 
00079     enum process_status status;
00080 
00082     struct io *in;
00083 
00085     struct io *out;
00086 };
00087 
00089 struct exec_call {
00091     unsigned int options;
00092 
00101     char **command;
00102 
00109     char **environment;
00110 };
00111 
00115 struct exec_call *create_exec_call ();
00122 void free_exec_call (struct exec_call *call);
00123 
00130 struct exec_context *execute(struct exec_call *call);
00131 
00138 void check_exec_context (struct exec_context *context);
00139 
00147 void free_exec_context (struct exec_context *context);
00148 
00149 #endif
